What are the symptoms of Aquagenic pruritus ?,"What symptoms are observed in patients who have aquagenic pruritus? Aquagenic pruritus causes intense itching in the parts of the body that come in contact with water without an associated rash. The head, palms, soles, and mucosa are usually not affected.",GARD,Aquagenic pruritus
